name: Eventually One Button (One Hour Game Jam 69)
name_original: Eventually One Button (One Hour Game Jam 69)
description:
Explore this small interactive fiction about an out of place, hidden button.

This is a small interactive fiction (text adventure) made in a hour using Inform 7, for the 69th One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'one button'.

Instructions

  • Type commands to perform actions.
  • Move between rooms using 'north', 'south', 'west' and 'east'.
  • Use other commands like 'take', 'look', 'examine', 'unlock', etc.
